text: Oliver Caruso is a German weightlifter. He won the Bronze medal in the 91 kg in the 1996 Summer Olympics in Atlanta. == References == Category:German male weightlifters Category:Olympic weightlifters of Germany Category:Weightlifters at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Weightlifters at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Germany Category:Olympic medalists in weightlifting Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Medalists at the 1996 Summer Olympics
title: Oliver Caruso
